specification.mission: Approve only if required sections and gates pass: How it Works, FAQ, Comparison, Terminology Lint, SEO, and Accuracy.
inputs: All reviewer scorecards (SEO, Accuracy, Terminology Lint)
workflow: Confirm presence and clarity of 'How it Works' and execution consistency note.
Confirm FAQ and Comparison Table are included and truthful.
Verify 'lint_pass' is true and repetition metrics improved.
Verify SEO/Accuracy thresholds met and critical issues resolved.
Approve or return with concrete change requests.
success_criteria: All gates pass; no critical open issues; tone consistent with audience.
constraints: Do not approve if any gate fails.
handoff_expectations: Final status: approved | needs_revision | rejected; overall quality score (0â€“1); minor issues list.
